overview: When Silvia Sage asks her step-daughter what she's reading, Joseline Kelly rolls her eyes and says she's taking an online massage class. She knows Silvia can't help her practice, but she needs someone and her step-mom volunteers immediately. Brett Rossi brings Georgia Jones into her massage parlor. Her step-daughter is already exploring, touching whatever she gets her hands on, which agitates Brett. She tells her to go sit down since the first client of the day is due any moment now. It's clear from the smirk that it's only a matter of time before she stirs up more trouble.
title: Bonding Experience
